description: Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in versions prior to 4.7.0 of Quiter Gateway by Quiter. This vulnerability allows an attacker to execute JavaScript code in the victim's browser by sending a malicious URL trhough the id_factura parameter in /<Client>FacturaE/listado_facturas_ficha.jsp.

product.name: Quiter Gateway (Java WAR on Apache Tomcat)
